channel.title: New TT
channel.description: I was just wondering.. how much does this new armour cost, what does it do? Because if it costs alot im about to go get some clue scrolls. You can get these from the same mosters you usuall get level 3 clue scrolls from right? I havent played RS in months because of SCAR, thats why im askin. Anyone know?

item.title: New TT
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Yea, the new tts are a pain in the asshole. I had to buy snakeskin, addy med helm, and all this crap. And I got 20 chaos, a firestaff, and some other gay piece of shit. And there’s no point in asking now. When d2h’s first came out, it was like 10 mil+. Now its like ~1.2 mil. So wait until the price stabilizes.

Read full topic

item.title: New TT
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

TT = Treasure trail. In runescape, it’s a peice of paper that requests you go to random places, while taunting the possible chance of a reward should you manage to actually complete it.

oh… now i remember good times back in the day

Read full topic
